name: Flip Flop (Ben James)
description:
Flip Flop is a puzzle game developed for Weekly Game Jam #137.

The aim of the game is to eliminate all red tiles from the level. Levels are randomly generated.

Clicking on a tile will change the colour of that tile but also the colours of every tile in the same row and column.

Start on 'easy' to see how the game mechanics work.

The 'iterations' number denotes the minimum number of turns required to clear the level.
